notes: Cartagena, Colombia. 7-suite colonial boutique hotel in the Walled City, 17th-century building. Very active on Instagram (17K followers). Each suite named after a native Colombian bird. Highly photogenic, strong social media presence.
Medellin, Colombia (El Poblado). Design boutique hotel with rooftop pool, strong lifestyle brand. 33K Instagram followers. Known for social-media-friendly rooftop bar and city views.
Medellin, Colombia (El Poblado, Via Primavera). Botanical-inspired 22-room luxury boutique hotel and spa in the heart of Medellin's creative district. 16K Instagram followers. Michelin Guide listed.
Cartagena, Colombia. 18th-century palace, renovated 2022. Relais & Chateaux member, 2 Michelin Keys 2025. Only hotel in Colombia with that distinction. Ideal for luxury influencer partnerships.

Isla Baru near Cartagena, Colombia. Luxury beachfront island hotel. Also: guestservice@lasislas.com.co and operaciones@lasislas.com.co. Most luxurious hotel in the Rosario Islands area â€” dream backdrop for content creators.

Arenal, Costa Rica. Adults-only, 35 private villas with mineral hot spring plunge pools. Relais & Chateaux. One of the most-photographed hotels in Central America. 70K Instagram followers. PR handled by Alice Marshall Public Relations.

Osa Peninsula, Costa Rica. Leading eco-lodge within 1,000 acres of protected rainforest. Multiple international awards. Toll-free: 1-800-963-1195. Part of Boena hospitality group. Beloved by sustainability-focused travel creators.

Uvita, Costa Rica. Adults-only 8-suite luxury hotel overlooking the Whale's Tail sandbar. Forbes called it 'the most glamorous romantic resort in Costa Rica'. Member of Cayuga Collection. PR contact via collection press rep Dana Cohen.

Manuel Antonio, Costa Rica. Only luxury hotel on the beach in Manuel Antonio. 5-star beachfront & rainforest resort. Member of Cayuga Collection. Also reachable via Cayuga press: info@cayugaonline.com and dana.cohen.pr@gmail.com.

Gulf of Chiriqui, Panama. 400-acre private tropical island. Panama's first National Geographic Unique Lodge of the World. 34K Instagram followers. CEO Hans Pfister: hans@cayugaonline.com. Perfect for exclusive island content.

Casco Viejo, Panama City, Panama. Panama's first artistic boutique hotel, 10 rooms designed by local/international artists. Rooftop bar with city views. 43K Instagram followers. Consistently featured in best-of lists for social-media-friendly hotels.

Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. Iconic oceanfront Ipanema/Copacabana landmark since 1923. 511K Instagram followers. Belmond global influencer/PR contacts also include belmond@karlaotto.com (Karla Otto agency) and belmond@fronteralatam.com (Frontera Latin America).

Rio de Janeiro (Ipanema beach), Brazil. Philippe Starck-designed icon on Av. Vieira Souto. 707K Instagram followers (brand account @fasano). Brazil's most influential luxury hotel brand. Group marketing: contact via rio@fasano.com.br.

Santa Teresa neighborhood, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. Bohemian neighborhood boutique converted from a 19th-century mansion. 108K Instagram followers. Dedicated Press Room on website. Michelin Guide listed. Accor MGallery collection.

Tulum, Mexico (included as key LATAM property for EXA audience reach). Dedicated influencer/creator collaboration email confirmed. Also press@ourhabitas.com for press inquiries. Sales: sales.tulum@ourhabitas.com. One of the most creator-friendly hotel brands globally.

Aguas Calientes (Machu Picchu), Peru. World-class eco-luxury cloud forest lodge. 61K Instagram followers. World's first 'Climate Positive' hotel brand. 50+ years of sustainable travel. Also: ecommerce@inkaterra.com. Has dedicated 'Instagrammers of Peru' editorial content.

Cusco, Peru (gateway to Machu Picchu). 16th-century monastery converted to a 5-star hotel. Belmond's global PR also via belmond@karlaotto.com, belmond@fronteralatam.com, belmond@grassipartners.com. Desiree Tejada covers all Peru Belmond properties.

Machu Picchu, Peru. The ONLY hotel at Machu Picchu's entrance. Unmatched sunrise access to the ruins. Belmond Mediahub available for press. Global advocacy/influencer contact: carolyn.beaudry@belmond.com. Desiree Tejada covers Peru.

Buenos Aires (Recoleta), Argentina. Leading luxury hotel with award-winning Elena restaurant and Pony Line bar. Confirmed press contact: Delfina Daponte, Public Relations and Communications Manager. Phone: +54 11 4321 1654. Excellent for lifestyle/food content.

San Pedro de Atacama, Chile. Michelin Key 2025. #6 Best Resort in South America (Conde Nast Traveler). Baillie Lodges / Tierra Hotels group. Media/marketing inquiries: +562 6469 0518. All-inclusive luxury lodge overlooking Licancabur Volcano.

Jose Ignacio, Uruguay. Avant-garde beachfront art hotel. Also reservations@vikretreats.com. Three Vik properties in the area (Playa, Estancia, Bahia). Beloved by luxury fashion and art influencers. Extraordinary contemporary art collection throughout.

Punta del Este, Uruguay. 4-star design hotel 900m from Playa Brava and Playa Mansa. Rooftop pool with ocean views. Known for contemporary design aesthetic. Popular with social media travelers visiting Punta del Este's high season (Dec-Mar).

Torres del Paine, Chilean Patagonia. Relais & Chateaux luxury lodge. All-inclusive with private guide per suite. Properties also in Atacama and Iguazu. Santiago reservations: +56 2 22339641. Spectacular Patagonian landscapes ideal for adventure content creators.

Cloud forest, Ecuador (60 miles from Quito). Award-winning eco-lodge in private Mashpi Reserve. 124K Instagram followers. Operated by Metropolitan Touring. Press & News section at metropolitan-touring.com/all-about-us/press-news/. Breathtaking photogenic setting.

Barranco district, Lima, Peru. Restored 1914 Belle Epoque mansion. Relais & Chateaux. Located steps from galleries, boutiques, and cafes in Lima's most bohemian neighborhood. Highly photogenic interiors. Phone: +51 1 2060800.
